page.title: 13Andoversford - Resident M(1)
page.content: S Mr.Finch was born in Andoversford in 1903,which means that he has lived in the village for 83 years.Before 1914 Andoversford contained 36 houses,one by the school which was a doctor's surgery and one by "Sunnyside"which is the name of Mr.Finche's house.All of these were removed when the road was developed. The others included small houses which were joined to make a larger one,one small cottage,one farmhouse with buildings,eight cottages,three cottages which were converted from stables,railway houses,one old Police station which is now flats,the old forge which is now a private residence,nine more cottages-one was a doctor's surgery,the Royal Oak Inn which was built in 1643 and ten cottages built before the railways.
